title: Schedule of Events | Language and Culture Learning Center | University of Illinois at Chicago
contents: Skip to the content of this page ,  the main menu , the secondary menu , the site search form , the site home page .           Language and Culture Learning Center     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Language and Culture Learning Center      Language and Culture Learning Center   Main Menu    About           What We Do    Who We Are    Affiliate Language Centers         Peer Tutoring           What is Peer Tutoring?    Meet Our Tutors    Tutoring Schedule (ONLINE as of 3/16)    For Students (Tips and Resources)    Become a Tutor    Peer Tutoring Blog    Tutoring FAQ    Contact Peer Tutoring         Events           Schedule of Events    Conversation Hours    Film Series    Special Events         Language StorieS    For Instructors           Professional Development    Instructor Resources    COVID-19 Resources         Contact           General Inquiries    Equipment Reservation    Oasis Reservation          Eyebrow menu    lcsl.uic.edu    las.uic.edu    +Give    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Language and Culture Learning Center    Events    Schedule of Events        Schedule of Events  Conversation Hours have moved Online!      How to access  Virtual Conversation Hours      See the schedule below for all online conversation hours. To see what's happening this week, click on "Week" in the upper right corner of the calendar. "Agenda" will show all events organized by days and times.            Events           Schedule of Events    Conversation Hours     Arabic Conversation Hour    Chinese Conversation Hour    French Conversation Hour    German Conversation Hour (SprachCafe)    Italian Conversation Hour (Piazza Italia)    Japanese Conversation Hour    Spanish Conversation Hour      Film Series     Ancient World, Modern Media    Central & Eastern European Film Club      Special Events             Conversation Hours  Interested in attending a conversation hour in your favorite language? See here for the conversation hour schedule and more details! All Conversation Hours in GH 308 are free open to the public.      Film Series  Interested in attending a Film Series event in your favorite language? Check the schedule here! All film screenings are available to the public, and we provide tea, coffee, & fresh popcorn too!      Peer Tutoring  Find out more about our Peer Tutoring program, meet the tutors, and view schedules for Spanish, Italian, French, and German Peer Tutoring in GH 305 & GH 308!      Reserve the Language Oasis  If you would like to schedule a special event in our Language Oasis please click here and let us know how we can help.
